mapper.insert:
insert into TOM_GRP_ORG_RELATION (CODE, GRP_CODE, ADMINISTRATOR, PHONE, EMAIL, STATUS)
select #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.administrator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tom_grp_org_relation
where grp_Code= #{grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into TOM_GRP_ORG_RELATION
CODE,
GRP_CODE,
ADMINISTRATOR,
PHONE,
EMAIL,
STATUS,
